fault.description: Is the error a server-side fault?

id.description: ID is a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

message.description: Message is a human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

name.description: Name is the name of this class of errors.

BooksUploadInvalidMediaTypeResponseBody.title: Mediatype identifier: application/vnd.goa.error; view=default

fault.description: Is the error a server-side fault?

id.description: ID is a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

message.description: Message is a human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

name.description: Name is the name of this class of errors.

BooksUploadInvalidMediaTypeResponseBody.description: Error returned when the Content-Type header does not define a multipart request. (default view)

BooksUploadInvalidMultipartRequestRespon.title: Mediatype identifier: application/vnd.goa.error; view=default

fault.description: Is the error a server-side fault?

id.description: ID is a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

message.description: Message is a human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

name.description: Name is the name of this class of errors.

BooksUploadInvalidMultipartRequestRespon.description: Error returned when the request body is not a valid multipart content. (default view)
